verses.verse: Whoever <S%H157>loves<s%> <S%H4148>discipline<s%> <S%H157>loves<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> But he who <S%H8130>hates<s%> <S%H9640>reproof<s%> is <S%H1198>stupid.<s%>

A <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H2896>man<s%> will <S%H6329>obtain<s%> <S%H7522>favor<s%> from the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> But He will <S%H7561>condemn<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> who <S%H4209>devises<s%> <S%H4209>evil.<s%>
A <S%H120>man<s%> will not be <S%H3559>established<s%> by <S%H7562>wickedness,<s%> But the <S%H8328>root<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> will not be <S%H4131>moved.<s%>
An <S%H2428>excellent<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%> is the <S%H5850>crown<s%> of her <S%H1167>husband,<s%> But she who <S%H954>shames<s%> [him] is as <S%H7538>rottenness<s%> in his <S%H6106>bones.<s%>
The <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> are <S%H4941>just,<s%> [But] the <S%H8458>counsels<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> are <S%H4820>deceitful.<s%>
The <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H693>lie<s%> in <S%H693>wait<s%> for <S%H1818>blood,<s%> But the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H3477>upright<s%> will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> them.
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> are <S%H2015>overthrown<s%> and are <S%H369>no<s%> more, But the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> will <S%H5975>stand.<s%>
A <S%H376>man<s%> will be <S%H1984>praised<s%> <S%H6310>according<s%> to his <S%H7922>insight,<s%> But one of <S%H9389>perverse<s%> <S%H3820>mind<s%> will be <S%H937>despised.<s%>

<S%H2896>Better<s%> is he who is <S%H7034>lightly<s%> <S%H7034>esteemed<s%> and has a <S%H5650>servant,<s%> <S%H4480>Than<s%> he who <S%H3513>honors<s%> himself and <S%H2638>lacks<s%> <S%H3899>bread.<s%>

A <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H6662>man<s%> <S%H3045>has<s%> <S%H3045>regard<s%> for the <S%H5315>life<s%> of his <S%H929>beast,<s%> But the <S%H7356>compassion<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is <S%H394>cruel.<s%>

He who <S%H5647>tills<s%> his <S%H127>land<s%> will <S%H7646>have<s%> <S%H7646>plenty<s%> of <S%H3899>bread,<s%> But he who <S%H7291>pursues<s%> <S%H7386>vain<s%> [things] <S%H2638>lacks<s%> <S%H3820>sense.<s%>
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H2530>desires<s%> the <S%H9285>booty<s%> of <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H7451>men,<s%> But the <S%H8328>root<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H5414>yields<s%> [fruit.]

An <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H7451>man<s%> is <S%H4170>ensnared<s%> by the <S%H6588>transgression<s%> of his <S%H8193>lips,<s%> But the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> will <S%H3318>escape<s%> from <S%H6869>trouble.<s%>

A <S%H376>man<s%> will be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with <S%H9185>good<s%> by the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of his <S%H6310>words,<s%> And the <S%H1576>deeds<s%> of a man's <S%H3027>hands<s%> will <S%H7725>return<s%> to him.
The <S%H1870>way<s%> of a <S%H191>fool<s%> is <S%H3477>right<s%> in his own <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> But a <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H2450>man<s%> is he who <S%H8085>listens<s%> to <S%H6098>counsel.<s%>
A fool's <S%H3708>vexation<s%> is <S%H3045>known<s%> at <S%H3117>once,<s%> But a <S%H6175>prudent<s%> <S%H6175>man<s%> <S%H3680>conceals<s%> <S%H7036>dishonor.<s%>
He who <S%H6315>speaks<s%> <S%H530>truth<s%> <S%H5046>tells<s%> <S%H6664>what<s%> is <S%H6664>right,<s%> But a <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness,<s%> <S%H4820>deceit.<s%>

<S%H3426>There<s%> is one who <S%H981>speaks<s%> <S%H981>rashly<s%> like the <S%H4094>thrusts<s%> of a <S%H2719>sword,<s%> But the <S%H3956>tongue<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H4832>brings<s%> <S%H4832>healing.<s%>
<S%H571>Truthful<s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%> will be <S%H3559>established<s%> <S%H5703>forever,<s%> But a <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%> is <S%H5704>only<s%> for a <S%H9541>moment.<s%>
<S%H4820>Deceit<s%> is in the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of those who <S%H9177>devise<s%> <S%H9563>evil,<s%> But <S%H3289>counselors<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%> have <S%H8057>joy.<s%>
<S%H3808>No<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H205>harm<s%> <S%H579>befalls<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> But the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> are <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H9563>trouble.<s%>
<S%H8267>Lying<s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%> are an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> But those who <S%H6213>deal<s%> <S%H530>faithfully<s%> are His <S%H7522>delight.<s%>
A <S%H6175>prudent<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H3680>conceals<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> But the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%> <S%H7121>proclaims<s%> <S%H200>folly.<s%>
The <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H9167>diligent<s%> will <S%H4910>rule,<s%> But the <S%H9559>slack<s%> [hand] will be put to <S%H4522>forced<s%> <S%H4522>labor.<s%>
<S%H1674>Anxiety<s%> in the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7812>weighs<s%> it <S%H7812>down,<s%> But a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H8055>makes<s%> it <S%H8055>glad.<s%>
The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> is a <S%H8446>guide<s%> to his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> But the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H8582>leads<s%> them <S%H8582>astray.<s%>
A <S%H9559>slothful<s%> <S%H9559>man<s%> does not <S%H2760>roast<s%> his <S%H6718>prey,<s%> But the <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H1952>possession<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%> [is] <S%H9167>diligence.<s%>
In the <S%H734>way<s%> of <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> is <S%H9132>life,<s%> And in [its] <S%H1870>pathway<s%> <S%H5410><s%> there is <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H4194>death.<s%>
